title: STAT+: NIH funding rates for early-career researchers plunged in 2025, new data show
description: A Trump administration change to how NIH awards grants has sharply reduced early-stage investigators’ odds of securing funding.
content: A Trump administration change to how NIH awards grants has sharply reduced early-stage investigators’ odds of securing funding.
